meanings.definition: A set of instructions stored in a computer's memory that controls the operation of the central processing unit.
meanings.sent1: Microprograms help the computer run smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The engineer studied microprograms to improve the CPU's performance.
meanings.sent3: The microprograms in the computer had a party and made the CPU dance!
meanings.sent4: The microprograms acted like tiny directors, guiding the CPU's every move.
meanings.sent5: The intricate microprograms were like a conductor leading a symphony of computer processes.
